hero.subtitleDefault: BI Student Organisation unites students across campuses. Explore the opportunities and find your way into the community.
hero.titleDefault: A strong student voice across all BI campuses
hero.mission: We help students connect, grow and influence across every BI campus.

mainContent.title: About BISO
mainContent.subtitle: BI Student Organisation
mainContent.paragraph1: BI Student Organisation (BISO) is the heartbeat of student life at BI Norwegian Business School. We're dedicated to creating unforgettable experiences, fostering meaningful connections, and empowering students to make the most of their university years.
mainContent.paragraph2: From exciting social events and career workshops to cultural festivals and sports competitions, we offer something for everyone. Join us and become part of a community that celebrates diversity, encourages innovation, and creates memories that last a lifetime.

identity.title: Built by students for students
identity.description: BISO is Norway's largest student union. From parties to politics, we're the backbone of student life at BI.

mission.title: Driven by impact
mission.description: We champion student rights and make sure your voice is heard in every decision.

members.title: 12,000+ members
members.description: Thousands of BI students collaborate through committees, boards and volunteer teams.

impact.title: Nationwide community
impact.description: Four campuses, one organisation. We share knowledge, resources and good vibes across Norway.
